meanings.definition: Cleaned thoroughly by scrubbing or scouring.
meanings.sent1: The bescoured kitchen floor sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The bescoured dishes were spotless and gleaming.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her bescoured car looked brand new.
meanings.sent4: The bescoured windows revealed a crystal-clear view of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The bescoured countertops were so clean you could eat off them.

meanings.sent1: She bescoured the bathtub until it shone like new.
meanings.sent2: The maid bescoured every corner of the room diligently.
meanings.sent3: He bescoured his shoes before the important meeting.
meanings.sent4: The detective bescoured the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent5: The archaeologist bescoured the ancient artifact to reveal its true beauty.
